about_content.content: Hello, I’m a Dona, full stack software. Having hands own experience in developing web applications using Angular & Spring Boot. I consider myself as a passionate learner, responsible and very punctual. I completed all my works with my full satisfaction and also ensure my complete presence of mind for the particular work.

Before describing detailed about my professional interest and carrier goal, I'm a B-Tech graduate in Computer Science and Engineering and also completed a course and internship in J2EE. Currently I'm working as Software Developer at UST Global, Trivandrum. I'm looking forward to fly high to achieve a great carrier and happy life ahead by doing something good for which organization & great for my career.

description.list: Java and Angular developer with 4 years of professional excellence.
Good understanding of object oriented concept.
Hands on experience developing web applications using Angular, Spring Boot and various other technologies.
Worked on different phases of Software Development Life Cycle.
Experience in handling complex projects and rapidly evolving requirements
B-Tech Computer Science & Engineering graduate and completed an internship in J2EE.
Adaptable to work independently as well as a team member.
Ability to learn new technologies with minimal time period.
Able to work in high pressure and extended hours as per the project needs.
Willingness and ability to learn new technologies quickly.

skill_list.list: Web Technologies: JSP, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, etc
Software IDE: Intellij, Eclipse, NetBeans, Visual Studio Code

project_summary.label: Project Summary:
project_summary.value: Equifax is an American multinational credit reporting agency. MyEquifax web application is mainly used to manage security freeze, fraud alert and disputes, and access free credit reports and myEquifax products. Amoung all these our team handles fraud alert modules.

value.list: Front end design and development in Angular 8.
Front end unit testing using Jasmine/Karma, end-to-end testing using protractor, and writing automation test using cucumber using gherkins language
Being part of daily standup calls and Weekly Grooming calls.
Understanding the requirements and Coding with respect to wireframes discussions from grooming call.

skills_used.label: Skills Used:
skills_used.value: Spring Boot, Angular 8, SQL, Bootstrap, Html 5, Protractor, Jasmine/Karma unit testing etc

project_summary.label: Project Summary:
project_summary.value: To create a platform to visualize Agile metrics at an Enterprise level. Most of the tools like JIRA, TFS or Trello mainly focus on a particular project’s standpoint. The goal is to have a common dashboard at a portfolio level which will showcase the reports at a different levels of abstraction(Account, Business Unit, Project level).

value.list: Worked extensively in Agile development process.
Responsible for frontend optimization and performance techniques.
Responsible for frontend as well as backend development.
Responsible for different business meetings with clients and daily reporting to the project manager.

skills_used.label: Skills Used:
skills_used.value: Spring Boot, Angular 7, Chart Js, ECharts, Nebular, Mongo DB, Bootsrap, Html 5 etc.

value.list: Front end design and development in Angular 6 using PRIME NG components with unit testing in Karma/Jasmine.
Being part of daily standup calls and Weekly Grooming calls.
Understanding the requirements and Coding with respect to wireframes discussions from grooming call.

project_summary.label: Project Summary:
project_summary.value: Cherrystay is a web application like TP Bazaar. It helps us to find places nearby Trivandrum for better home stay/PG/House for rent facility. This application uses various web technologies like Spring MVC, Rest, Angular JS, Hml, and uses AWS for deploying the application in cloud, JHipster for developing the wireframe of the application.

value.list: Worked extensively in Agile development process.
